text: Daniel Boone is a 1907 American silent movie directed by Wallace McCutcheon and Edwin S. PorterDaniel Boone; or, Pioneer Days in AmericaJanet Staiger, Sabine Hake. Convergence Media History and stars William Craven, Florence Lawrence, and Susanne Willis. ==Actors== *William Craven as Daniel Boone *Florence Lawrence as Boone's daughter *Susanne Willis *Mrs. William Craven ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1907 movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Wallace McCutcheon Sr.
title: Daniel Boone (1907 movie)
